text: Nicholas Langrishe Alleyne Lash (6 April 1934 - 11 July 2020) was an English Roman Catholic theologian. He worked for a short while as a Roman Catholic priest. He held for twenty years the post of Norris-Hulse Professor of Divinity in the University of Cambridge from 1978 to 1999. Lash died on 11 July 2020, aged 86. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2020 deaths Category:English theologians Category:English Roman Catholics
title: Nicholas Lash
